name: Over the Hedge: Hammy Goes Nuts!
description: Explore new areas of suburbia including backyards, sewers, construction sites and housing tracts, in more than 30 different worlds. Rearrange levels to accomplish goals and revisit unlocked levels to earn high scores just for fun in Quick Play mode. Play alone or with a friend in hot-seat Multiplayer mode, which allows up to four players in any of the previously unlocked levels.
